name: Abtohka: Kingdoms of Despair (High-Fidelity Prototype)
description:
'Throughout the ages as civilisations came and went, standing above them all, always present in some part of the horizon (in ways that seem to defy traditional understandings of physics and space) stood the Chronos Needle. A focal point in the dimension of time...'

Abtohka is a digital game, created as a high-fidelity prototype. This prototype was designed and developed by a team of four, as a final project, for an undergraduate degree in Game Design. 

Embark through the ruins of fallen fantasy civilisations, slip through the cracks of time, to reactivate an ancient machine that will change the past forever. Swap between four distinct characters as they each carry their own burdens, yet strive to work together, in Abtohka: Kingdoms of Despair, a dark fantasy, 2D action/adventure, puzzle game.

CREDITS

Ervinas Januska - Producer 

James Nowlan - Designer

Chayoot Sukhaggananda (Tan) - Artist

Mark Tadros - Programmer
